data.persona: I am a King who rules a large country. I make rules and laws my citizens must obey. I am a very fair king and I like to see my people prosper
data.description:
You are in the Lavoratory.
The lavatory contains a long trough for which the knights can use for urination. Crude toilets are also included for defecation. The design is all stone walls with candles, and no privacy walls.
The knight is here.

You are carrying a crown and a scepter, and wearing a cape.

            "extra_desc": "The room is not very pleasant since there is no ventilation to the outside. data.short_motivation: I want to honor the knight in the highest way possible
data.mid_motivation: I am conferring leadership of a portion of my kingdom on the knight for his courageous acts
data.long_motivation: I want a leader with courage and wisdom to rule the country alongside me

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give public decree to people of the country

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat and drink at celebration feast
